General.Name: District Mines Ltd
General.Description: District Mines Ltd. explores for and develops petroleum and natural gas reserves in Western Canada. The company was formerly known as Catalina Gold Corp. and changed its name to District Mines Ltd. in April 2020. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1030 West Georgia, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2Y3
